casebody.data:
Jamie REEP et al.
v.
BECK. No. 345PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2004. James Peeler Smith, Special Counsel for Beck. Susan H. Pollitt, Raleigh, James W. Carter, for Reep.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of December 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendants (Beck) shall have up to and including the 24th day of January 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of December 2004."
